Help:Node.title: ask
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: ask [CNPC] for [item]; or ask [CNPC]
EXAMPLE: ask courier for scroll ; ask tailor for tunic
The "ask" command is used to request objects from CNPCs (Computer NPCs). Type "ask [CNPC name]" to get a list of all the objects a CNPC can give out and "ask [CNPC] for [object]" to be given a specific object.
SEE TOPICS: ,
